name: Score a Night at stupid meme's
name_original: Score a Night at stupid meme's
description:
Welcome to the 7th (working) Iteration in of FNAB series. The game has changed, and the difficulty has increased.

In this fast-paced experience. You must gain the required amount of points and then manually exit to pass a night. Counter your foes properly and efficiently to get points. Overusing your equipment will result in you losing points.

There’s no clock 

There’s no phone call

T̷̫͉̰͕̒́h̶̯̰̝̻̿̓͢ę̷̵̧̖̫̗̆̊r̶̷̲͍̭͐̾̀͟ę̷̵̧̖̫̗̆̊'s̩͙͖̋͛͟ n̷̶̯͉̊̽̐ͦ͘ȍ̸̢̢̮͚̐̚ m̶̷͔ͪ̽͡ę̷̵̧̖̫̗̆̊r̶̷̲͍̭͐̾̀͟c̷̹͖͋́̃y̯̤͑́́̓́
